channel.title: Final devolution 2.5
channel.description:
hi people, here it is, Final Devolution 2.5! well this one took me along time to create than any other version. The reason why, is because this ones combat system was re-made from scratch again but alot more flexible, reliable and accurate. i do not know why i am releasing this here, cause this is more a base to work on then a playable server but owell =).
with all the latest updates into the combat system makes it the most flexible, adding new parts is super fast, simple and straight forward so when you guys use it, you can add more features, rules or whatever real easy.
story line of the server.
it started from devolution 7.0 which was created by bakatool. i then made the following servers in order from first to last.
-vipscape
-vipscape project j
-devolution 7.5
-devolution 7.6
-devolution 7.7
-devolution 7.8
-devolution 7.9
-devolution 8.0
-devolution 8.1
-devolution 8.1u2
-devolution 9.0
-devolution 9.1
-devolution 9.1u2
-devolution 9.2u1
-devolution 9.2u2
-devolution x
-final devolution
-final devolution 2.1
-final devolution 2.2
-final devolution 2.3
-final devolution 2.4
-final devolution 2.5
after creating up to 7.8 i had the attention of quite a few people, which made me carry on making and improving, now to this day after alot of different scripts 2.5 is finally arrived, i have had over 50k downloads of my work. 90% of comments are positive and not negative. i am glad to give you guys 2.5 as it has had the most biggest make over, which means from the small things as walking to the major things to combat has all been remade, and still getting remade everyday to be the best of the best, this combat has pretty much flawless, if anything is not right its just cause i havnt been told or remembered to add it in. somethings i leave undone, so other people can make tutorials for it and get it spread around.
features
MAGIC
- 100% magic base for normal and ancients, autocast/normal cast
- detects staff types and enforces staff rules (staff as in a fire staff)
- ancients and binds all hold emenys for the correct amount of time, if there already frozen it doesnt re-freeze.
- if teleporting in combat all attacks are canceled.
- follows you may want to change the distances in rangedistance,
- timings are run from events and all hit when there surpose to
- working bonus's such as magic and range def.
- splashes without showing damage
- if hit, damage shows slighty after the ending gfx for the spell, like real rs
- ancient magics have been altered so there how real rs is.
- autocasting, uses proper staff for magic type, if runs out of runes it will start meleeing them with the staff and turn the buttons off for autocast
MELEE
- all special attacks work.
- instant spec on click, unlike all other servers where you click special and wait 1 sec before its even on.
- working bonus's
- all timings are run from events.
RANGE
- drawbacks, graphics, timings.
- range was the first combat skill i learnt to make.
- has drawbacks
- correct timing into the projectile.
- hits the target at the correct time and shows the damage perfectly
- working bonus's
- follows with a distance etc.
- close to perfect range damages
VARROCK
- banks and dummie room is a safe area.
- walking into safe areas give a 20 sec count down, you are able to be attacked in this time
- only in red colored writing areas is where you will loose your items on death.
- yellow zone writing (example this is yellow pretend "3-126" ) is safe to die in, no items are lost.
- all rules work perfectly and are real time to the server meaning they are checked on every checkpoint.
WILDERNESS
- the wild is just like real rs was, multi zones and single zones in the correct places.
BANKING
- runs from events
- withdraw works for 1 5 10 all
- deposit works for 1 5 10 all
- x doesnt work
SERVER SIZE
- the server size in tiny to all other servers, even though this is mainly all just combat features.
- client.java 280kb
- very resource friendly
- low cpu usage
download link
http://uppit.com/v/IZ7A60Y4
this will probably be up for download for only a week, then its gonna be deleted and replaced with 2.6 which has npcs and normal varrock and pvp varrock at the convience of a command.

item.title: Final devolution 2.5
item.dc:creator: @jc22493 Jc22493
item.description:
@jc22493 wrote:

[quote=“sydiang, post:16, topic:283644”][quote author=tlpkscape link=topic=374856.msg2829662#msg2829662 date=1245289029]

So are all dupes fixed? Are the objects fixed? And are there any commands pre-programmed such as: ::bank ::makestaff ::xteleall Etc, pretty much anything different from Devo 7 feature wise? if not thats fine too, Il probably use this as my base just thought I’d ask a few questions. Looks good, I would give some rep if I could =P

wooow what a fagg… can’t you do it by ur self.
[/quote]

“if not thats fine too” Learn to read, and then learn to spell, and then maybe just MAYBE I might acknoledge your post as not just trying to flame a dude you don’t know.[/quote]
Quite contradictory, eh?
